name: Bunny Kingdom
description:
The Baroness Rosemary has gone on her monthly hike, but after being gone for several weeks, the Alfalfa Kingdom has gone on high alert. Surely this has to be the work of the Wildflower State's Apothecary, a mage who calls the border between the two kingdoms home. 

The King would send his strongest and most skillful knights, but a war with the Wildflower state has all of the soldiers tied up, so Tammy Hayes (you!) will have to suffice! Explore the outskirts of the Alfalfa Kingdom for clues, collect keys, and triumph over platforming challenges to figure out what happened to Rosemary!

  • Short and sweet adventure platformer!
  • Nonlinear, explorable environment with puzzles and secrets!
  • Works on authentic hardware!

CONTROLS (BROWSER VERSION)

A/D or Left/Right: Move left and right

S or Down: Interact, inspect

J or Z: Jump

K or X: Run

Enter: Start/pause

Shift: Select

Square Brackets ( [ or ] ): Change color palette
